title.rendered: CfP: ARSSS-International Conference on Artificial Intelligence (ICAI), Bangalore [Oct 8; Students; Engineers; Researchers; Academicians]: Submit by Sept 23

content.rendered:
Submissions are invited for the ARSSS-International Conference on Artificial Intelligence (ICAI), Bangalore. The paper submission deadline is September 23, 2025; other important dates are below!

About ARSSS-ICAI

The ARSSS-ICAI International Conference on Artificial Intelligence (ICAI) is a prestigious event aimed at providing a global platform for academicians, researchers, engineers, industry professionals, and emerging students to share their research findings with international experts. ICAI 2025 will be held in Bangalore, India, on October 8, 2025.

Organized by the Advanced Research Society for Science and Sociology (ARSSS), the conference will feature numerous invited lectures from distinguished speakers across the country. The event will also recognize outstanding contributions with Best Paper Awards for papers deemed to make the most significant impact.

Previously, ARSSS has hosted successful conferences in various international locations, including London (UK), Singapore, Kuala Lumpur, Penang, Jakarta, Bali, Batam, Bangkok, Paris, Istanbul, Melbourne (Australia), Pattaya, Phuket, Manila, Hong Kong, Johannesburg (South Africa), Phnom Penh (Cambodia), Abu Dhabi, and Dubai.

Publication Opportunites

Publication in Journals: This conference is Associated with Google Scholar, Scopus, Web of Science, ABDC and UGC Care listed Peer reviewed international journals.

Publication in Conference Proceedings: All registered conference papers will be published Conference proceeding (Having ISBN Number) and the extended versions of the papers will be published in related reputed Scopus/ SCI/WoS/UGC Care Listed international journals.

All registered conference papers will be blind peer-reviewed by three ARSSS conference committee reviewers. The post-conference proceedings will be submitted for indexing in the International Science Index and Thomson Reuters, CiteSeerX, Google Books and Google Scholar, EBSCO, SCOPUS, ERA and ProQuest.

The conference proceedings book and certificate of presentation will be distributed to the conference participants at the conference registration desk.

Call for Papers

All honourable authors are kindly encouraged to contribute to and help shape the conference through submissions of their research abstracts, papers and e-posters. Also, high-quality research contributions describing original and unpublished results of conceptual, constructive, empirical, experimental, or theoretical work in the related areas are cordially invited for presentation at the conference.

The conference solicits contributions of abstracts, papers, and e-posters that address the themes and topics of the conference, including figures, tables, and references to novel research material.

Click here for more

Important Dates

How to Submit?

Interested candidates can submit their papers via this link.

Deadline

The paper submission deadline is September 23, 2025.

Click here to view the official notification for the ARSSS-International Conference on Artificial Intelligence (ICAI), Bangalore.
